My perfect day

How does my perfect day look like? It's an interesting question.

Morning

I wake up early, around 7 a.m. Then I take a shower and brew some coffee. After that I go for a walk or a bicycle ride. I'm waking up and breathing fresh air with a sense that nature wakes up with me. That's my favourite feeling.

Here are the activities that author of Miracle Morning book suggests doing after waking up:

  • Meditation
  • Exercises
  • Journaling
  • Affirmations
    Affirmation Effect
    I am healthy Health
    I get a lot of money Money
  • Reading

Evening

What do I like to fo in the evening?

  1. Entertainment
    • Reading
    • Watching TV or movies
    • Playing PS
    • Meeting with friends
  2. Well-being
    • Jym
    • Walking
    • Relaxing
    • Other
  3. Priorities
    1. Jym
    2. Meeting with friends
    3. Walking
    4. Reading
    5. Playing PS
    6. Watching TV or movies
